remarks: Change the bound variable of a restricted uniqueness quantifier using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
cbvral.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvral.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvral.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvreu $p |- ( E! x e. A ph <-> E! y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
